titles: Military and spirituall motions for foot companies with an abridgement of the exercise of a single company as they now ought to be taught and no otherwise : composed in Ireland and now published for the good of his fellow soldiers in England / by Captaine Lazarus Haward ...
author: Haward, Lazarus.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Military art and science --  Quotations, maxims, etc. --  Early works to 1800.
